ygData.subject: RE: re: gossimer
ygData.msgSnippet: I got a piece of gossimer in runneyeye when we were camping the crown (wasn t king but the other one) ... From: Jenni [mailto:freya@freya.cx] Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
I got a piece of gossimer in runneyeye when we were camping the crown
(wasn't king but the other one)

-----Original Message-----
From: Jenni [mailto:freya@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 7:45 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Armor look


From: Jenni <freya@...>

Where does the gossimer drop? What level mobs drop it as well. I'm still
relatively low level, so some of the higher level dungeons are out of the
question for me, at least right now. :)

Ezrae
16th DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis

Quentin Goldsmythe wrote:

> From: Quentin Goldsmythe <hifireview@...>
>
> It's Gossimer that looks like leather, not Woven.
>
> --- Jenni <freya@...> wrote:
> > quick FYI:
> >
> > I spend hours in Upper Guk over the weekend trying
> > to get this woven armor (I may not be fighting the
> > right stuff). I finally got a pair of sleeves. The
> > sleeves did not show up on my character if I took
> > my robe off. I am going to stay down there for a
> > while (GREAT exp!) and see if I can get a full set.
> > It doesn't look like it's going to show up, but it's
> > decent armor anyways.
> >
> > Ezrae
> > 16th Level DE Enchantress
> > Brell Serilis
> >
> >
> > Janea 'Jake' Knight wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Janea 'Jake' Knight" <Janea@...>
> > >
> > > Are we talking CHEST items here? If so, I am
> > THERE baby....
> > > I have lots of leather and plate look stuff but if
> > I take my robe off I've still got that mini dark
> > > elf red bikini top... grrrr
> > >
> > > >>>>
> > > Any armor equipable by your true race will show up
> > on another race you have
> > > taken the form of. Only problem is that you are a
> > caster, and cant wear
> > > much other than cloth or magical armor. Only think
> > I can think of that will
> > > give you a nice armored look is Woven armor, and
> > the ribcage armor from the
> > > Goblin Alchemist in Misty Thicket. Both appear as
> > leather on your character.
> > >
